body: This reverts https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/12072 which depends on https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/12399 (not yet merged) part of that is to make use of the new `group` argument in `mkdirp` provided by #12399, and part of that is to make use of a provided feature to set ownership based on group id rather than group name (also provided by #12399).
title: Revert 12072
